description: Make the&nbsp;Cosmopolitan a little more versatile with this simplified version of it. Anyone can mix up this beautiful Crantini because all you need is&nbsp;vodka and&nbsp;cranberry liqueur!
name: Crantini
recipeIngredient: Dried or fresh cranberries for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker, combine the vodka and cranberry liqueur. Stir well.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker, combine the vodka and cranberry liqueur. Stir well.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with dried or fresh cranberries.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with dried or fresh cranberries.
